Node.Text: Good afternoon, Ms. Alex. What floor?
Indeed it is. Floor three, please.
You seem to be in a good mood today. Is there good news?
Let's just say that this story I'm working on won't be so awful after all.
Yes, I may have evidence that indicates a homicide rather than a suicide.
Would you care to share this "evidence"?
You should now better than that, operator. A reporter never exposes her sources. Anyway, have a good day.
I see, I'm glad you're having a good day.
I'm not the nosy type. If you're happy, then I'm glad, but I'm not concerned about why.
Ha! We both know that's a lie. You're exactly the type to poke your nose where it doesn't belong. But, I suppose if you don't want to hear, then I hope you have a good day.
